p: Our study included 6 sites distributed across Michigan, USA with co‐occurring populations of native and non‐native Phragmites (hereafter Michigan Sites; Appendix S1: Table S1) and two sites in Ohio, USA, in which dense native and non‐native Phragmites stands co‐occur and mix (hereafter, Ohio Sites; Appendix S1: Table S1). Sampling protocols differed slightly between the two regions and are described in detail below.
